question: Which organization has released a report stating that 1 in 3 women have experienced physical or sexual violence, once in their lifetime?
explanation:
The World Health Organisation (WHO) has stated in a report that 1 in 3 women across the globe have been subjected to violence (physical / sexual) at least once in their lifetime.
This report is an outcome of a study conducted by WHO in 161 countries among women and girls over 15 years of age.
